languages.text: Заявил{mf||а} Каллигосу, что вы родственные души, прозрев на нем скверну.
Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.
languages.original_text: Заявил{mf||а} Каллигосу, что вы родственные души, прозрев на нем скверну.

traits.locale_text: Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.
Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.

Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.
Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.

languages.text: 你告诉卡里戈斯，说你感觉到了他体内的腐化，说你们两个实际上是盟友。
languages.original_text: Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.

traits.locale_text: 你告诉卡里戈斯，说你感觉到了他体内的腐化，说你们两个实际上是盟友。

languages.text: Calligos gesagt, dass ihr zwei eine Gemeinsamkeit teilt, als du die Verderbnis in ihm erkannt hast.
languages.original_text: Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.

traits.locale_text: Calligos gesagt, dass ihr zwei eine Gemeinsamkeit teilt, als du die Verderbnis in ihm erkannt hast.

languages.text: Vous avez dit à Calligos que vous étiez semblables en percevant la corruption en lui.
languages.original_text: Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez dit à Calligos que vous étiez semblables en percevant la corruption en lui.

languages.text: Le has dicho a Calligos que tenéis algo en común al percibir la corrupción en su interior.
languages.original_text: Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.

traits.locale_text: Le has dicho a Calligos que tenéis algo en común al percibir la corrupción en su interior.

languages.text: カリゴスの中に腐敗があることに気づいたあなたは、ふたりには共通点があるとカリゴスに告げた。
languages.original_text: Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.

traits.locale_text: カリゴスの中に腐敗があることに気づいたあなたは、ふたりには共通点があるとカリゴスに告げた。

languages.text: Calligos'a içindeki yozlaşmayı algılamanın ardından aranızda bir bağ oluştuğunu söyledin.
languages.original_text: Told Calligos that the two of you shared a kinship upon perceiving the corruption within him.
